unnormalised: Okay, folks, grab your chai and settle in, because the masala is SPICIEST today!
normalised: Okay, folks, grab your chai and settle in, because the masala is SPICIEST today!

unnormalised: We’re diving headfirst into the shallow end of the celebrity gossip pool, and trust me, the chlorine levels are questionable.
normalised: We’re diving headfirst into the shallow end of the celebrity gossip pool, and trust me, the chlorine levels are questionable.

unnormalised: First up, whispers are swirling around Parineeti Chopra and Raghav Chadha. Are they, aren't they? The nation wants to know! Saw them AGAIN at the Mumbai airport, looking very cosy. Sources say destination Rajasthan for a roka ceremony soon. 15th May, maybe? Fingers crossed! Remember the hullabaloo when they were spotted having dinner at Indian Accent in Delhi? This saga has more twists than a Govinda dance number!
normalised: First up, whispers are swirling around Parineeti Chopra and Raghav Chadha. Are they, aren't they? The nation wants to know! Saw them again at the Mumbai airport, looking very cosy. Sources say destination Rajasthan for a roka ceremony soon. fifteenth May, maybe? Fingers crossed! Remember the hullabaloo when they were spotted having dinner at Indian Accent in Delhi? This saga has more twists than a Govinda dance number!

unnormalised: Then there's our favourite, Deepika Padukone. Sources tell us she recently flew to London for a hush-hush meeting with top designers. Is she prepping for Cannes? Or perhaps…a Project K promotional blitz? Maybe both? We hear there are whispers about a collaboration with Manish Malhotra for a dazzling sari that'll break the internet. We expect nothing less.
normalised: Then there's our favourite, Deepika Padukone. Sources tell us she recently flew to London for a hush-hush meeting with top designers. Is she prepping for Cannes? Or perhaps…a Project K promotional blitz? Maybe both? We hear there are whispers about a collaboration with Manish Malhotra for a dazzling sari that'll break the internet. We expect nothing less.

unnormalised: And lastly, Arjun Kapoor was spotted leaving Bandra's Lilavati Hospital yesterday. No details yet, but fans are speculating whether it's related to Malaika Arora's recent dance injury on India's Best Dancer. Let’s hope everyone is okay. Remember that one time she slipped on set, the whole set thought it was a scene from "ChaalBaaz"? So dramatic! Get well soon Malaika, hope you’re back to dazzling us with your moves soon!
normalised: And lastly, Arjun Kapoor was spotted leaving Bandra's Lilavati Hospital yesterday. No details yet, but fans are speculating whether it's related to Malaika Arora's recent dance injury on India's Best Dancer. Let’s hope everyone is okay. Remember that one time she slipped on set, the whole set thought it was a scene from "ChaalBaaz"? So dramatic! Get well soon Malaika, hope you’re back to dazzling us with your moves soon!

unnormalised: That's all the celeb juice for now. Stay tuned for more Bollywood drama, rumours, and speculation! Until next time, keep it spicy!
